info.title: Auth API
info.description: An API for signing up, in, and out of an account and for leaving behind json web tokens and cookies to ensure that a user remains signed in during their session

get.summary: Retrieve the Current User logged in if one is logged in, otherwise return null

post.summary: Will try to sign the user in by comparing password to one stored (encrypted) for a particular email

parameters.name: body

email.description: The User's email must be typed in

password.description: The User's password must be typed in

parameters.description: The user must input their email so the correct user can bge found and their password so their identity can be confirmed before granting them a token

200.description: The User's email and password were correct and they signed in and got a token for their session

400.description: (Bad Request Error/ Validation Error) Invalid Creditentials - Either email or password (or both) is incorrect or missing

post.summary: Will create a new user in the database using name, email, and password

parameters.name: name

name.description: Name must be inputted to be saved as your name in the new account

email.description: The email that will be used to sign in [currently only @sitechhs.com domains but will be changed later]. It will be stored in the User

password.description: The password that will be used to sign in. Will be hashed and saved (must be between 8 and 16 characters)

parameters.description: The User must input a name, the email they plan to sign in with, and a password to make an account

400.description: (Bad Request Error) Email is in use - an account has already been made with this email

post.summary: The User will be signed out of their account and their session ended

get.summary: Will verify that the token (session) has not yet expired. If it hasn't expired it will automatically sign in and send a token. Tokens last 6 hours.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token created when you signed in

200.description: The token was still viable, it has been renewed and the user remains signed in on their session

400.description: (Bad Request Error) The Token is not valid - it has expired and the user's session has ended

404.description: (Not Found Error) The User found in the token does not exist.
